content: laurus was created for the fringe hatalong 1 in three sizes and two heights slouchy light blue and fitted green laurus is a simple stylish unisex beanie with a striped brim and moderate amount of colorwork **size** 18 3/4 20 21 1/4 / 47 5 51 54 cm circumference at brim 7 / 18 cm in length from brim to crown fitted 8 5 / 21 5 cm in length from brim to crown slouchy both samples shown in 20 / 51 cm size **needles** *size a * 16 / 40 cm circular needle in size needed to obtain gauge 1 set dpns in size needed to obtain gauge suggested size us 8 / 5mm *size b * 16 / 40 cm circular needle two sizes smaller suggested size us 6 / 4mm **yarn** worsted-weight yarn in two contrasting colors *fitted version approximately * 90 100 105 yds / 80 90 95 meters main color mc 16 17 18 yds / 15 16 17 meters contrasting color cc shown in quince & co lark in marsh mc and bird s egg *slouchy version approximately * 110 120 135 yds / 100 110 125 meters main color mc 16 18 20 yds / 15 16 16 meters contrasting color cc shown in quince & co lark in bird s egg mc and marsh **notions** 6 stitch markers 1 unique to mark beginning of round tapestry needle for weaving in ends **gauge** 18 sts and 24 rnds = 4 / 10 cm in st st on size a needle 1 http //fringeassociation com/tag/fringe-hatalong-series/
